actions.description: The aspect makes one Bite attack, one Claw attack, and one Tail attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 19 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (2d12 + 10) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12) force damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 20) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The aspect can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: 19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (2d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 27 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: The aspect exhales multicolored flames in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) damage of a type of the aspect's choosing: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.
actions.name: Chromatic Flames (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description: The aspect makes one Claw or Tail attack.
actions.name: Attack

actions.description: The aspect makes one Bite attack. If the attack hits a creature, the target must succeed on a DC 27 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the aspect until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Furious Bite (Costs 2 Actions)

conditionImmunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, poisoned, stunned
damageImmunities: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
name: Aspect of Tiamat

specialTraits.description: If the aspect would be reduced to 0 hit points, her current hit point total instead resets to 500 hit points, she recharges her Chromatic Flames, and she regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the aspect can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 155,000 XP (310,000 XP total) for defeating the aspect of Tiamat after her Chromatic Wrath activates.
specialTraits.name: Chromatic Wrath (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

specialTraits.description: If the aspect fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
